name: Need For Sweet!
description:
Let the sugar rush begin! 

You won't find Gloppy and Lord Licorice in this candy land, just acres of nothing but your favorite candies strewn about to create the ultimate sphere of sucrose. 

Roll your chocolate ball around collecting as much candy as your poor teeth can handle, getting bigger and bigger until you collect enough to create the biggest ball of candy money can buy.

 Once your ball is big enough to block out the sun, roll 'er on into the candy factory and see if you've got what it takes to make the worlds greatest ball of saccharine superiority!

The Team

Programmers - https://ashkman.itch.io/ |  https://johnng.itch.io/

Artist - https://tantedante.itch.io/

Sound designers - https://amerrittaudio.itch.io/

Want to save your progress?  Smoother Gameplay? Play offline?

Simply scroll down and hit download, then follow the instructions.  Easy Install and Uninstall !  (currently only Windows)
